## SendableEthersStabilio.stakeXbrlWethUniTokens() method

Stake Uniswap XBRL/ETH LP tokens to participate in liquidity mining and earn STBL.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
stakeXbrlWethUniTokens(amount: Decimalish, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<SentEthersStabilioTransaction<void>>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
